title: RD - Eye-deologically Thinking
itunes:title: RD - Eye-deologically Thinking
description:
Adam and Mark reconnect remotely as Mark continues his quarantine as they discuss the unfortunate reality that vaccinations are not slowing breakthrough cases of Covid. They also review video of Rand Paul interacting with HHS Secretary Xavier Becerra about natural immunity and Adam floats one of his famous conspiracy theories surrounding LAUSD. As the show wraps up Adam shows Mark a political attack ad aimed at Florida Governor Ron DeSantis

Watch this episode on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe to that channel, the exclusive home of Reasonable Doubt
